---
title: "About"
---

Carolynn Rui is currently a fourth-year UCLA student double majoring in Psychology and Statistics with a minor in Theater. She's especially interested in how data and human behavior intersect in research, and currently volunteers as a finance associate for Hooligan Theater Company. When she’s not analyzing numbers, she’s probably singing, performing, or planning her next adventure with friends. On weekends, you’ll find her exploring new spots in LA, trying out fun activities, or just making great memories with the people around her. If you're interested in her previous work and leadership experience, take a look at her [resume](/Resume.pdf){target="_blank"}!
